jsonrpc module¶

class jsonrpc.JsonRpc(host, port, user, password)[source]¶

Bases: object

Simple implementation of a JSON-RPC client that is used to connect to Bitcoin.

call(method, params)[source]¶

Call a method over JSON-RPC.

queryHTTP(obj)[source]¶

Send an appropriate HTTP query to the server. The JSON-RPC request should be (as object) in ‘obj’. If the call succeeds, the resulting JSON object is returned. In case of an error with the connection (not JSON-RPC itself), an exception is raised.

exception jsonrpc.JsonRpcConnectionError[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Error thrown when the RPC connection itself failed. This means that the server is either down or the connection settings are wrong.

exception jsonrpc.JsonRpcError(obj)[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

The called method returned an error in the JSON-RPC response.
